sentences.english: Its public position is that it abides by all UN arms embargoes .
sentences.chinese: 其公開立場是，他們遵守所有聯合國的武器禁運命令。

sentences.english: Smuggling is rampant so the embargo imposed by the government seems useless.
sentences.chinese: 走私很猖獗，政府的禁運令行同虛設。

sentences.english: This could include an international arms embargo and other targeted sanctions on Burma.
sentences.chinese: 這可包括國際性的武器禁運令和其他針對性的制裁。

sentences.english: Call them embargoes , call it suffering, call it pressure.
sentences.chinese: 叫他們禁運，稱之爲痛苦，把它的壓力。

sentences.english: The yacht went to Cuba, apparently breaking the American embargo.
sentences.chinese: “夏風號”曾去過古巴，很明顯違反了美國的禁運令。

sentences.english: The arms embargo, which applies equally to Gaddafi and the opposition, will have to be circumvented.
sentences.chinese: 對卡扎菲及其反對派的武器禁運必須要想辦法規避。

sentences.english: The sanctions also include an arms and military material embargo.
sentences.chinese: 當時的制裁措施包括武器和軍用物資禁運。

sentences.english: Use a single source to search for restricted trading parties or embargoed countries.
sentences.chinese: 使用單一資源搜索受限貿易方或禁運國家或地區。

sentences.english: It would not even let its ships enforce the arms embargo on Libya.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至不允許其海軍船隻實施對利比亞的武器禁運。
什麼是禁運品，都包括什麼？

sentences.english: Poultry products from those countries were embargoed by many places.
sentences.chinese: 疫區的禽產品在世界許多國家遭到禁運。

sentences.english: We have noted that political considerations are usually involved in trade embargoes .
sentences.chinese: 我們注意到在貿易禁運中通常會有政治因素。

sentences.english: The Yom Kippur War was followed by an Arab oil embargo.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯石油禁運後接踵而來的是贖罪日戰爭。

sentences.english: NATO has taken command of enforcing the arms embargo and the no-fly zone.
sentences.chinese: 北約已經承擔了實施武器禁運和禁飛區的指揮權。

sentences.english: Additional military-related items could be added to the banned list, she said.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，禁運名單可能會增加更多的軍事相關產品。

sentences.english: Instead, we impose an embargo or throw someone in prison.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我們卻實行貿易禁運或是把某人投進監獄。

definition: signatory states/countries that are party to a treaty
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
fire ant (Solenopsis invicta), an introduced species in China
